## CCSelectorState.setChangeHandler property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Sets a change handler function that is run with the current phone number value every time the value changes. This is used e.g., in the combined selector components (`CountryCodeSelectorCombinedZustand` and `CountryCodeSelectorCombinedReact`<!-- -->) to update the value prop when the component is used as a controlled component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setChangeHandler: (handler: ((event: {
        target: {
            value: string;
        };
    }) => void) | undefined) => void;
```
